## ToolboxCategory.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ToolboxCategory` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(categoryDef: CategoryInfo, parentToolbox: IToolbox, opt_parent?: ICollapsibleToolboxItem);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  categoryDef | CategoryInfo | The information needed to create a category in the toolbox. |
|  parentToolbox | [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox.md) | The parent toolbox for the category. |
|  opt\_parent | [ICollapsibleToolboxItem](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The parent category or null if the category does not have a parent. |
